main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted over Ramey Air Force Base in Puerto Rico on April 6, 1967.
interesting points: The UFO was first observed by several individuals near the enlisted men's club.
The object was described as a bright, oval-shaped light that seemed to be hovering or traveling at a slow rate of speed.
The object was under observation for approximately two minutes.
No sound was associated with the object.
There were no other details available concerning this incident.
location: Ramey Air Force Base, Puerto Rico
